ygData.subject: Re: The Loyal Autobot
ygData.msgSnippet: The manta ray was out of its natural environment.  He had been swimming in the giant freshwater lakes for several days when he noticed a disturbance. Looking

The manta ray was out of its natural environment.  He had been
swimming in the giant freshwater lakes for several days when he
noticed a disturbance.

Looking up into the sky from underwater, a dark shadow loomed
overhead.  He swam up fast and as he surface, he flew a good 10 meters
in the air before his body re-organied and sprouted rockets.  Now in
flight mode, he could clearly see the shape of a massive floating
plate with buildings atop it.  He sped up and began flying toward it.

"Hmmmm...." he said, in a tone conveying his intrigue.

On 11/26/07, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
> Underwater just offshore from a mighty river in the eastern oceans of the
> Southern Hemisphere, the earth shifts and a pile of rocks and silt begin to
> slide.  Several boulders are hurled to the ocean depths and a ghostly figure
> emerges from the debris.
>
> "Alive?" exclaimed the voice, turning around to the pile and scanning it
> feverishly.
>
> After a few minutes, he gives up his obsessive scanning, content that what
> he is looking for is no longer here.  Low on energy, he transforms to beast
> mode, a metallic manta-ray, and quickly swims off.
>
